name: Speed Matching
description:
CONTROLS:

mouse

Don't drag & drop! Click on a die on the right, then click on the board to place it.

HOW TO PLAY:

Group dice with with same value/color.

A group disappears only if:

  1. the board is completely filled AND
  2. the group size is equal to the value (1x1, 2x2, 3x3, ...)

The size of the group must be exact, not more or less.

Dice with the same value form a group, if they share a side.
Dice with the same value do not form a group, if they only connect with a corner.

Use the arrows to slide the dice.
